law.catch_line: Except as otherwise specifically provided, the provisions of this title are intended to apply to aut...

text.section: Except as otherwise specifically provided, the provisions of this title are intended to apply to authorized insurers.

The provisions of this title that apply to an authorized insurer or a domestic insurer also apply to:
a nonprofit health service plan licensed under Title 14, Subtitle 1 of this article; and
a mutual insurance holding company formed under § 3-121.1 of this article.
